list.description:
Доброго времени суток! Доработка прицела от Т-34 завершена и успешно прошла тестирование. Прицел является универсальным, но с одним условием: если не подойдёт один - попробуйте другой. В архиве их два.

Было обновлено:

Добавлены цифры к вертикальным рискам по правую сторону

Буду благодарен, если отпишитесь по поводу ошибок. Если понравился - скачивай, ставь и удачи в сражениях!
#universal
#historical
#sight

M3 and M3A3 Bradley IFV Historical Gunner Sight

Suitable for both #M3 and #M3A3 #Bradley. Reticle lighting is always on

With white crosshair colour available, it's finally looking more like the real thing!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GjfvG36NhNQ

Two Versions
V1 = Green lighting
V2 = White lighting

2077 themed sights for 10.x MBTs.

Works for:

FR: Leclerc S1/S2

GER: Leopard 2A5/2A6

ITA: C1 ariete, Centauro MGS, Dardo

SWE: Strv 122A

UK: Challenger 2F

US: M1A2

RU: T-72B3, T-80BVM, T-80U, T-90A

Schindibee's fictional "FELIS" Sight for Swedish IKV 91

#customsight #sight #fictional #felis #sweden #ikv91 #ikv_91

This is a fully fictional sight for the Swedish IKV 91 light tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo (HEAT-FS)
- Deflection shooting lines for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Black daylight and green night colour crosshairs
- Optimized/simplified for use with laser rangefinder

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder...

日本Ho-Ro (JP)


https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1jo4y1y7ZN?p=2

#sight #fictional #cute #horo

This is a sight for IL-28Sh specifically for SK24 rockets. It isn't 100% accurate, especially at 1000m mark. I suggest attacking at 30 to 60 degree angles. I will test it more later and update this post if I find any flaws.

Realistic sight for French and Israelian tank AML-90 + ELAN 90 Mk7

Preference use with standard sniper view due the tank not have automatic parallaxe correction.

Zip file contain:
-Folder of vehicles
-Sight file in each folder

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448


#aml #aml90 #sight #historical

Adds Hana Isuzu from Girls und Panzer to your tank sight, as well as some sweet encouraging words.

Works for all tank's sight, works with crosshair lighting as well. (Instructions included in file)

Creating this took a hell of alot of time and effort, but was definitely worth it. I hope she brings you as much joy as she did to me.

#girls_und_panzer #girlsundpanzer #isuzuhana #sight #anime

file.name: Hana Sight + Instructions for All  Tanks.zip

list.description:
Historical Peri Z11 Sight for Marder.

Contains files for:

  • marder 1A1
  • marder 1A3


#marder #marder1a1 #marder1 #marder_1a1 #marder1a3 #historical

当前版本：2.7.0.24 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】
由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】
此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.7.0.24 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. Because it hasn't been updated for a long time, I just help to update and optimize it【 The production of this sight is approved by the original author

Due to the change of sight scale of some top-level vehicles in the new ver...

#t72b3 #t80bvm #t90a #2s25m #t80u #t80uk #sosna_u #thermal (aparently few different russian thermals have the same reticle)

IMPORTANT: Manually adjusting distance in top tier is pointless so this sight does NOT feature manual distance numbers, only rangefinder numbers, this sight will not help you if you do not have thermals nor rangefinder

This is as good as the thermal channel for the more recent russian FCS's (like Sosna-U) can look like in WT atm... as there are some limitations to custom sights in WT that make it impossible to make it look ...

Historical and realistically sized reticle for the M247 Sergeant York.

The sight was designed to help the gunner lase a target, the small circle is 0.5 mils and showed the diameter of the laser for ground targets, the big circle is 3 mils in diameter and illustrates the diameter of the laser used for lasing air targets.

The horizontal lines are 2 mils apart.

The double lines inside the large circle are 0.25 mils apart.

Hand made by me, STGN :D

#historical #sight #m247 #m247_sergeant_york

Last Updated [June/28/2022]

This is a pack of collimator sights for planes and helicopters. Specifically for simulator battles.

Not all of these sights are mine, it's just a collection of those available on Live. There are more of them on the website, but I only picked those that might ease your life in simulator battles. In attached archive there are written guides on using collimator for some vehicles. If there are none, then it isn't hard to figure out how to use it. Whether you've read anything or not, I still strongly recommend to do a test drive before u...

Last Updated [May/24/2021]

This is a sight for Hurricane Mk.IIB/Trop so that it would be easier to use RP-3 in SB.

Important! This sight doesn't guarantee 100% accuracy, but I think it'll be handy for people that do not know how to or struggle with launching rockets.

How do I use it?
Big circle is meant for rocketing at close distances (up to ~300m).The closer you can get the better. Doing that from far away doesn't make much sense. Launches aren't very precise at the angles of diving close to 90, but these kinds of scenarios should be rare because ...

# t_72a # t_72b # t_90a # t72a # t72b # t90a

Simple and convenient sight for T72a, T72b and T90a

I did not know what to call the sight, so I called PSO 3 (for T72) and PSO 4 (for T90) because of some, in my opinion, external similarity ...
